resources.string: Rental Application and Application Fee ~ Each applicant of legal age must submit a rental application. There is a non-refundable application fee of $36.00 per applicant. Photo I.D. and Social Security Card
A valid government issued photo I.D. and Social Security Card is required to verify applicant’s identity. Income Requirements and Proof of Income
Applicants must provide proof of income with a completed application. Total gross monthly household income must be at least two (2) times the monthly rent amount.

Provide applicable form of: Pay Stubs (4 most recent, consecutive). Bank Statements (3 most recent, consecutive). Official statements of additional income (statement of SSI, disability, child support, I-20 documentation, etc.). Official Letter of Acceptance or New Hire Contract from Employer showing base salary amount. 1099 or W-2 (2 most recent years) Tax Returns (2 most recent years)

B & B Property Management will verify applicant’s employment, rental, and credit history, as well as a background check, to process the rental application. NO Evictions or Bankruptcy will be accepted.
Co-signers must qualify for income at three (3) times the monthly rent and have good credit.

Maximum number of occupants allowed for a one-bedroom apartment is 3 people. Maximum number of occupants allowed for a two-bedroom apartment is 5 people. Maximum number of occupants allowed for a three-bedroom apartment is 7 people.
Employment, Rental, Credit History, and Background Check
Please add your comments. We sould love to hear from you.
Thanks for your email. We look forward to speaking to you soon!
